titleStmt.title: By the King a proclamation touching the sealing of tobacco.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, Printers to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Requiring Virginia tobacco already imported to be sealed within one month.
"Giuen at Our Court at White-Hall, the thirtienth day of March, in the third yeere of Our Reigne of Great Britaine, France, and Ireland.
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
